title: Shollym  Patch - All in One Update 1.0 (June)
description:
Shollym patch update 1.0

download http://hosted.filefront.com/Shollym/

- Complete kitserver (faces, hair, balls, boots, uni), you need only stadiums from the old kitserver, put them in this new kitserver and you can delete the old one. This is fully updated kitserver, do not add anything from previous updates to it, only install updates with DKZ from previous updates.

- Summer 2008 Chants update: Updated chants for: Brasilian teams - by Devilish from www.pesbrasil.org, Argentinian teams - by Caldera, German and Italian teams by Gigimarulla and Russian teams chants - unknown autor from www.peswe.com. Credits also to Emi from Argentina for many updated kits, aRIP and TiTeam Croatia for updated European national kits and all other kitmakers from evo-web and other pes websites.

Shollym patch update 1.0 - All updates that you need for this patch are here
All in one (november, march and summer 2008 update)
Reuploaded complete kitserver (4 parts, download http://hosted.filefront.com/Shollym/ ).
Includes (faces, hair, balls, boots, uni) with lots of new stuff.


Installation

1. Put stadiums from your old kitserver into this new one. Delete the

old kitserver.

2. Copy new option file - EURO 2008 OF

3. Copy el new PES6.exe

4. Install 0_text update 1.0 using DKZ studio

5. Install 0_ Sound update 1.0 using DKZ studio

6. Copy new e_text over your old one.

7. Copy opmov


IMPORTANT:

If you have installed all previous updates you don\\\&#039;t really need this one, it\\\&#039;s for new users to make the installation easier for them

Also if you have any problems with the patch, or you\\\&#039;re not sure whether you have installed everything or not, then install this update and it will be ok.

I will keep updating OF for this patch - Shollym
